title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - A32NX - Remotely control the MCDU
description:
In this video we will look at the latest developer version of the A32NX. The people from FlyByWire created an end of the year present for flight simmers by adding the option to remotely control the MCDY either by using the browser on the same machine or by using for example a Android tablet or iPad. In this video we will go to each step and will finish with a short demo using an iPad.

If you would like to give the addon a try yourself visit the site below to download it:
https://flybywiresim.com/

tags: Remotely control MCDU of A32 in MSFS2020
